questions.question_text:
An administrator needs to remove the capability to delete deployments from three blueprints for one business group.
How can the administrator accomplish this in one step?

discussion.content:
Must be D.
In the business group settings you just add users or groups. The entitlement combines actions, blueprints and services with a business group.

i'll go for D

The action is not included in the entitlement used to provision the item on which you need to run the action. Only entitled actions, either as part of an IaaS blueprint or as an XaaS resource action, can appear in the Actions menu.
